long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Salesforce Org Banner

Easily distinguish between your Salesforce environments with visually distinct, customizable banners. Designed for administrators, developers, and power users, this extension ensures clarity and prevents accidental changes in the wrong org.

Features:
- Customizable Environment Indicators: Assign unique colors, names, and labels to each Salesforce org.
- Modern User Interface: Intuitive design for a seamless and efficient setup.
- Lightning Experience Compatibility: Fully optimized for Salesforce Lightning environments.
- Workflow Precision: Instantly recognize your current org to minimize errors and improve efficiency.
- Built with modern frameworks, Salesforce Org Banner is your solution for managing multiple Salesforce environments with ease and confidence.

Version 1.1 Release Notes

New Features:
- Enhanced the Options UI:
  - Added tooltips for better usability.
  - Improved input validation with visual indicators for warnings and invalid entries.

Improvements:
- Refactored subdomain validation logic to improve performance and maintainability.
- Adjusted input field order in the options page for better logical flow.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed banner positioning issue on the Salesforce login page.
- General bug fixes to improve stability and performance.
